name: Jump Frog Jump Free
description:
Help the frog to reach shore!
Jump from rocs to turtles, from turtles to flowers, from flowers to wood logs while avoiding the carnivorous crocodiles.
Served by superbs animations and 8 bits style sound fx and musics, Jump Frog Jump HD is a full action packed game where playability is put first.
You'll be able to register your hiscores and compare yourself to players from all around the world, while helping your country to progress in the froggy international competition.
